messages.message: Huh….thats very strange. I can take a look tomorrow as well. FWIW my sandbox is quite old as well, and is doing OK. There must be something specific about your sandbox.
Heymian, can you and I schedule some time today to look at this? I’m curious what went wrong.
yes please, that would be much appreciated! I’m going to try another rebuild first to see if things come back properly, if not, I’ll ping you. :pray:

@Heymian did you run any specific commands after rebuilding your sandbox? I verified go and python were invocable and at the expected versions myself after doing the rebuild, so something must have altered your environment after that
Nope, I didn’t do anything. It had hibernated and it was gone when it came back up.
Last night python was there and Go was missing. Earlier in the day python was missing and Go was there.
alrighty, I'm taking a look now :slightly_smiling_face:
@Heymian would you mind sharing what you're observing when trying to invoke go/python/pip when you have a moment? I just revived your sandbox and I'm not seeing the problem :confused_dog:
I do see the failures in your daemons, I'm about to add a snippet to your .bash_profile that's missing to remediate those
Yesterday I was just trying to push a commit, and the pre-commit hooks failed with gofmt not found
and gofmt should be installed with go.
and “which go” also didn’t return anything
Also still not seeing that being a problem :thonk:
hrmmm okay I have no idea then. So is the thing to try next time to hibernate? Or cs build again?

you shouldn't have to do anything in the first place, so I think something else is going on that's specific to your environment :upside_down_face: if you wouldn't mind messaging me if it pops up again I would be more than happy to investigate, I'm sure you aren't the only person who has/will come across this and I'd like to understand where the gap is so I can easily unblock others if needed!
Yeah for sure, can ping if it comes up again. Fwiw, it was working great for me for quite a while, things just started failing for me these last couple of days after a rebuild.
